content:
@Charles Yaghmour
Can you please fill in the appropriate section of this page by 3pm (assume PT) today please.
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021+-+01+HL7+FHIR+Connectathon+Track+Report+Outs

Thanks
Hugh
@Hugh Glover Sure. Will do too shortly.
@Hugh Glover Hi, where can I find the zoom session recordings?

According to Mary Ann Boyle: "Once we have loaded them to Whova, you will find a link in the session that you wish to view. If you look at the International Patient Summary listing on Wednesday, you will see that there is a link titled watch recording"

So far as I can see none have been loaded as yet
#Hugh, is there a good place to get a list of attendees for each session?
I think there may be from staff, but I kicked myself for not writing them down and did it by memory.
No worries. BTW, I found out that track leads have access to the recording via and Zoom desktop application. Click on Meetings on top.
@Hugh Glover Hi, I just emailed you a draft of what I have so far for the report out brief...
